summary.title: React Component Tutorial
summary.description: In this tutorial, you'll implement a React component.

levels.title: Install @material-ui/core and Import a Button
levels.summary: First, you'll need to install the material-ui React library with yarn.
levels.content:
Open up a terminal in your root project directory and run:

```bash
yarn add @material-ui/core
```

Then add the following Button import:

```javascript
import Button from "@material-ui/core/Button";
```
